function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?

loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'x >= 0 && y < n' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'x >= 0 && y < n' always executed?

Is the loop with condition 'x < n && y >= 0' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'x >= 0 && y < n' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'board (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'row (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Is variable 'x' live at the end of function 'label'?
